cast.name: 埃利夫·库尔图瓦 Elif Kurtuaran
塔里克·巴布图鲁 Tarik Pabuccuoglu

trans_title: 无冕的公主 第二季
introduction: Months later... Harun, Yagmur's kind-hearted grandfather, has an offer for Masal who left Evgin's. That is for Masal to live the life of a princess in the mansion with Harun. But Masal rejects this dreamy offer right off the bat. On the other hand, Zehra, Hilal, and Cüneyt suddenly return under completely different circumstances and Masal is left alone. What Masal has been hiding from everyone is revealed. In the end, as everyone is on the brink of brand new lives, a mysterious message will remind Masal that everything, even being a princess, has a price.
chinese_title: 无冕的公主 第二季
